data.enText: an underground pipe that is used to carry sewage away from houses, factories, etc.

tr: a waste pipe that carries away sewage or surface water
misfortune resulting in lost effort or money
example: his career was in the gutter
all that work went down the sewer

value.def: A sewer is a large underground channel that carries waste matter and rain water away, usually to a place where it is treated and made harmless.
